question: Weight gain in normal pregnancy is?
exp: ANSWER: (C) 10-12 kgs. REF: dutta 6th ed p. 51weight gain: Total weight gain during pregnancy is llkgs, I. e Ikgs in 1st trimester, 5kgs in 2nd, 5kgs in 3rd. Rapid weight gain, >0. 5 kgs/week or 2 kgs/month is an early manifestation of preeclampsia Stationary or falling w. Teight suggests IUGR or IUD

question: Pregnancy iron metabolism-
exp: Ans. is 'd' i. e., Increase total iron binding capacity Physiological changes in iron etabolism during pregnancyo In the second half ofpregnancy the daily iron requirement is 6 - 7 gm. o Serum iron concentration decreaseso Serum ferritin decreaseso Serum total iron binding capacity increaseso Percentage saturation (serum ferretin/ serum TIBC) decreaseso Serum transferrin increases
